Respected Sir /Madam
With pleasure I am submitting my CV for the post of Social Science/English

I am confident to meet your expectations to motivate students in understanding 
their abilities and develop their confidence level. I will do my best to instill in them
interest for learning and desire for constant knowledge within each student.
Please give me an opportunity to meet you in person for an interview.
Sincerely
